data.title: Alphabets Printer
data.statement:
You have to print corresponding alphabets according to input given to you.
For each space separated value, print the letter with the same index in the alphabet repeated half of the index number, rounded up.

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int

data.outputDescription:
Corresponding alphabets according to its index in the alphabet for each of [[n]] integers.
Each on its own line, repeated half the number of its index, rounded up.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You have to print corresponding alphabets according to input given to you.
For each space separated value, print the letter with the same index in the alphabet repeated half of the index number, rounded up.
Input
Line 1: An integer n.
Line 2: n space separated integers.
Output
Corresponding alphabets according to its index in the alphabet for each of n integers.
Each on its own line, repeated half the number of its index, rounded up.
Constraints
1 < n < 20
1 ≤ value of n integers ≤ 26
Example
Input
3
5 8 10
Output
eee
hhhh
jjjjj
